text: This is a list of senior officers of the British 1st Armoured Division. ==General Officers Commanding== * Major General R. Evans 03/09/39 – 24/08/40 * Major General C. W. M. Norrie 24/08/40 – 05/05/41 * Major General H. Lumsden 12/02/41 – 19/07/42 (wounded) * Major General A. H. Gatehouse 19–22/07/42 (wounded) * Brigadier A. E. Fisher 22/07 – 15/08/42 (acting GOC) * Major General H. Lumsden 15–19/08/42 * Major General R. Briggs 19/08/42 – 27/04/43 * Brigadier T. J. B. Bosville 27/04–1/05/43 (acting GOC) * Major General R. Briggs 01/05 – 15/07/43 * Brigadier R. Peake 15–17/07/43 (acting GOC) * Major General A. Galloway 17/07/43 – 18/02/44 * Brigadier E. P. N. Jones 18–29/02/44 (acting GOC) * Major General A. Galloway 29/02/44 – 8/03/44 * Brigadier R. W. Goodbody 8–14/03/44 (acting GOC) * Brigadier E. P. N. Jones 14/–19/03/44 (acting GOC) * Colonel J. R. MacDonnell 19–24/03/44 (acting GOC) * Brigadier E. P. N. Jones 24/–27/03/44 (acting GOC) * Major General A. Galloway 27/03/44 – 10/04/44 * Brigadier E. P. N. Jones 10–15/04/44 (acting GOC) * Major General A. Galloway 15–27/04/44 * Brigadier E. P. N. Jones 27/04/44 – 10/05/44 (acting GOC) * Major General A. Galloway 10/05/44 – 14/08/44 * Major General R. A. Hull 14/08/44 – 24/11/44 * Lieutenant Colonel T. E. F. Vogel 24/11/44 – 11/10/45 ==References== Category:British armoured divisions Category:British Army personnel of World War II
title: List of senior officers of British 1st Armoured Division
